title:
Preparation of Schr\"odinger cat quantum state using parametric
  down-conversion interaction
abstract:
The Schr\"odinger cat state is important in quantum optics because of its
non-Gaussian properties. This paper proposes the use of degenerate parametric
scattering and measurement of the number of photons in the pump mode to
conditionally prepare the Schr\"odinger cat state. This method ensures the
preparation of SC in systems with weak parametric non-linear interaction.
Comparison with the existing whispering mode gallery microresonator from
lithium niobate indicates the possible applicability of this method.
